trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while validating the Java SDK installation in '{0}' that was found while searching the paths from '{1}'. Ensure that the Android section of the Visual Studio options has a valid Java SDK directory configured. To use a custom SDK path for a command line build, set the 'JavaSdkDirectory' MSBuild property to the custom path. Exception: {2}
trans-unit.target: An exception occurred while validating the Java SDK installation in '{0}' that was found while searching the paths from '{1}'. Ensure that the Android section of the Visual Studio options has a valid Java SDK directory configured. To use a custom SDK path for a command line build, set the 'JavaSdkDirectory' MSBuild property to the custom path. Exception: {2}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The path of the invalid installation {1} - a "contextual" name for where {0} came from: `Preferred Registry` (Windows Registry), `OpenJDK`, `$JAVA_HOME` (environment variable), etc. {2} - The exception message of the associated exception.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while reading configuration file '{0}'. Exception: {1}
trans-unit.target: An exception occurred while reading configuration file '{0}'. Exception: {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The path of the file being read. {1} - The exception message of the associated exception.
